name: Rage Mage (itch)
description:
Rage Mage is an Adventure RPG in which you go on quests, fight monsters, and become a mage.

On the menu screen, use the up and down arrow keys to cycle through the options, and enter to select the one you're currently on.

You can save the game by going into the pause menu ('P' key), but only while in Banlue Village. You cannot save during a quest.

Disclaimer: Rage Mage was my first proper game I ever developed. It is very basic and short and it was mainly meant to be a learning experience for me. Don't expect this to be your newest addiction, or to be the next greatest game of the year. But thanks to all the nice feedback, it's been great :D
